markdown.headingText: Hi, I am Pedro César Del Campo
markdown.markdown: ::: {.grid .gap-4 .mb-5} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-7} Data Worker who transforms complex data into clear, actionable insights through visualization, modeling, and evidence-based storytelling. I am passionate about using data to understand people, systems, and real-world challenges. My goal is to make insights accessible, meaningful, and useful for better decision-making. [View portfolio](portfolio.qmd){.btn style="background-color:#F8766D; color:white; border:none;"} [Download CV](assets/CV.pdf){.btn style="background-color:#00BFC4; color:white; border:none;"} [Let's talk](contact.qmd){.btn style="background-color:#E76BF3; color:white; border:none;"} LinkedIn GitHub DataCamp Platzi ::: {.grid .gap-3 .mt-4} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4} **8+** Years in data ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4} **20+** Projects delivered ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4} **-30%** Reporting time ::: ::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-5} ![](images/pcdcn_blancofondo.png){width="240" style="border-radius: 50%; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.12); display:block; margin-left:auto; margin-right:auto;"} ::: ::: Statistician and Data Scientist with extensive experience managing multidisciplinary and strategic analytical projects. Expert in processing and analyzing large volumes of data to generate key insights for decision-making. Proven track record in diverse fields including mobility, culture, health, fintech, marketing, education, nutrition, environment, social development, Indigenous communities, financial technology, and public policy. Known for my capacity for self-learning, adaptability to new technologies, and strong results-oriented mindset. Proficient in statistical sampling, multivariate methods, and predictive modeling, with advanced command of Python, R, SQL, and cloud-based analytical environments. ## What I do ::: {.grid .gap-3 .mt-3} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-3} **Data Engineering** Python/SQL pipelines, orchestration, and data quality to keep sources reliable. ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-3} **Analytics & BI** Clear dashboards in Power BI/Tableau with metrics the business can act on. ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-3} **Data Science** Predictive models and segmentation focused on impact and simple deployment. ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-3} **DataViz** Visual narratives in Quarto/ggplot that surface insights fast. ::: ::: ## Featured projects - **Project A (example)** — Automated reporting. Cut delivery time by 30% with Python + Power BI pipelines. - **Project B (example)** — Churn model. Identified critical segments and improved retention by 12%. - **Project C (example)** — Executive dashboard. Clear KPIs for leadership, adopted by 50+ users. _(Replace with your real cases and link to `portfolio.qmd#project` and repos if relevant.)_ ## Quick stack `Python` · `R` · `SQL` · `Power BI / Tableau` · `Pandas` · `Scikit-learn` · `Quarto` · `Git` ## How I work - Start from the business question and define success metrics. - Build reproducible, documented pipelines. - Deliver simple-to-read, actionable visuals. ## Testimonials / outcomes > "Pedro simplified our reporting and gave us weekly clarity." — Client / Internal team > "The dashboards became the official source for leadership." — Stakeholder _(Swap in real quotes when you have them.)_ ## Next step If you want to explore a collaboration or a quick diagnostic, reach out via `contact.qmd` or LinkedIn.
